name: Markus Divinus Adon
description: Gellewza 46%, Syrah 28%, Merlot 18%, Cabernet Sauvignon 6%, Sangiovese 1%, Girgentina Skins 1%. A dry, medium bodied, complex red wine, showing a youthful ruby colour of red fruit with aromas of strawberry, sour cherry and plum, oak maturation of smoke, toast, sweet spices of vanilla and coconut, and a stony mineral finish. This wine has signs of leather, making it complex to change to a meaty style with age. The medium levels of acidity are in combination with the levels of tannin giving a long aftertaste buttery finish on the palate.

name: Markus Divinus Grezz
description: Cabernet Sauvignon 65%, Merlot 35%. This wine is high in c omplexity showing earthy characteristics of mushroom, forest floor and wet leaves, animal characteristics of leather, meat, game, oak maturation of smoke, toast, vanilla and tobacco, and black forest fruit of blackcurrants and black cherries with a complex buttery finish. This wine is very high in rich tannins that can give a very long ageing potential of more than a decade and makes this wine full bodied and robust.

name: Markus Divinus Kiraz
description: 100% Syrah (20 year old Solum vines). A dry, full bodied rosé with a pink coloured deep intensity reflecting a hot climate wine and showing signs of ageing potential. A typical rosé wine of red fruits of ripe strawberries, cherries, raspberries and cranberries with a mineral finish of wet stones. The palate shows signs of red fruit ripeness and a high mouthwatering level of acidity that gives a good ageing potential in the bottle with a herbal and an earthiness finish.

name: Markus Divinus L-Imzabbab
description: 100% Moscato. A luscious, sweet, complex dried grape wine, with a medium golden appearance showing signs of ripe, late harvested grapes, aromas and flavours of dried fruit of raisins, sultanas, figs, dates, dried apricots and peaches, tropical fruit , lychees, marmalade jam, honey, golden syrup, maple syrup, lots of florally of roses and honeysuckle and a herbal mint and green tea long finish. The sweetness in the wine can help age for a long time in the bottle.

name: Markus Divinus Solum
description: 100% Syrah (20 years old vines). 295 precious bottles were produced. Only produced in exceptional years and outstanding vintage conditions. A deep intensity purple ink red wine showing signs of thick Syrah skins with highlighted long legs and therefore signs of excellent colour extraction from the skins and high alcohol levels. Lots of deposits and sediment on the legs making this wine unfiltered. An extremely pronounced intense black fruit character of blackberry, blueberry and mulberry with earthy notes of terroir, mushroom, mint and wet leaves, combined with complex animal, leather and meat and with a fine grained aroma of new French oak, toast and vanilla sweet spices. Solum 2017 has a very high level of acidity and tannins that can cellar for decades. A super premium, exclusive full bodied and robust red wine.

name: Markus Divinus Zafrana
description: Girgentina 65%, Sauvignon Blanc 35%. A young, light bodied wine reflective of its youthful green colour with notes of citrus fruit of lime and grapefruit, green fruit of granny smith apples with youthful complexities of grass, herbaceous, fresh herbs, hints of fennel and lots of clay minerality. This wine has a dry taste with high levels of acidity that makes it ideal as an aperitif.
